properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 5:54AM EST until February 8 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Jackson KY
properties.description:
...Forecast Flooding Changed from Minor to Moderate Severity for
the following rivers in Kentucky...

The Cumberland River at Pineville
The Cumberland River at Barbourville
The Cumberland River at Williamsburg

* The Flood Warning continues for
the Cumberland River at Barbourville
* until late Friday night.
* At 5:30 AM Thursday the stage was 26.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 27.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* The river will rise above flood stage this morning and continue to
rise to near 37.6 feet after midnight tonight. The river will
fall below flood stage early Saturday morning.
* At 38.5 feet...Homes begin flooding in Apple Grove, Sharp Gap and
Smokey.
properties.instruction:
A Flood Warning means that flooding is occurring or is imminent.

Continue to monitor NOAA weather radio or your favorite local media
outlet for additional information. If you are in areas affected by
this forecast take necessary precautions.

The next update will be issued by noon today.

NWSheadline: Forecast flooding increased from minor to moderate severity
